Date: Thursday, 2/2/1990
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of George Brett.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Subject: Contract offer

offer. 4 years is definitely not enough!

Tony Gwynn

Date: Wednesday, 4/5/1990
Subject: Melido Perez healing process
Melido Perez is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of David Nied
Dear Sir,
David Nied is doing pretty good at A Fort Myers Miracle!
He has an ERA of 1.55, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Dean Palmer
Dear Sir,
Dean Palmer has nothing more to prove at AA Memphis Redbirds!
He has an AVG of .435 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

you should demote him.

Scouting Director
